alert.note: Alert for Lake; McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 2:25PM CDT until April 04 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAKE AND NORTHERN MCHENRY COUNTIES... At 224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hebron, or 8 miles south of Lake Geneva, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Round Lake Beach, McHenry, Zion, Antioch, Fox Lake, Harvard, Lake Villa, Lindenhurst, Beach Park, Winthrop Harbor, Johnsburg, Lakemoor, Spring Grove, Wonder Lake, Wadsworth, Long Lake, Pistakee Highlands, Volo, Venetian Village and Richmond. This includes... Chain O Lakes State Park. Including the following interstates... I-94 between mile markers 1 and 5. I-294 between mile markers 1 and 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
